congratulations_book_completed: Congratulations, you have reached the end of this book.
unsubscribe_text: 75% of the proceeds of this subscription go directly the the Mayan Quetzal Governance Council.
about_trisummit: Sacred Records is a product of Trisummit Technologies LLC located in Tucson, AZ.
beta_testing: This App is in Beta Testing
beta_testing_text: Please report anything not working in this application to brian.nettles@trisummit.io.
banner_text_1: The Maya Quetzal Bio Region Council has released these records for viewing via subscription.
banner_text_2: 75% of proceeds go to the Maya Quetzal Bio Region Council.
proper_billing: This information is important for proper billing.
delete_personal_data_text: This will delete your name and email address from the account.
delete_account_text: This will delete your account including purchase and subscription history.  You will be logged out of the application and if you log in again, your original account will be recreated; however all historical data will be lost.
profile_settings_text: Allows update of given name, family name, and email address.
delete_profile_text: By deleting your personal information, it removes your name, email address, and Google Photo from the users table.  It also removes your name and email from the purchases and subscriptions table in the database.  UserID is retained as it is necessary for application functionality.
cancel_subscription_text: The Maya Quetzal Subscription contains ancient records and teachings found over all of the Americas.  75 percent of the proceeds go to the Maya Quetzal Bio Region Council.  Please consider keeping your subscription alive.
copyright_protected: Copyright under The First Circle of Chiefs Disciples.
